name: Dunyarzad
description:
When playing a Companion Support Card: Spend 1 less Elemental Die (once per Round).
After playing a Companion Support Card:Draw 1 random Companion Support Card from your deck (once per match).

storytext: "The point of living is to not leave behind any regrets."
